title: Luckwarper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use a night ability that any role can use each night.
- Use a day ability that any role can use each day.
- Gain any attribute of any role at any time. This resolves immediately.
- Trigger any event from <#1026213757623484487> or <#1024807072358998046> at any time. This resolves immediately.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot die or be removed from the game until Night 5.
- You can target yourself with all abilities.
- At the end of the game, roll a d20.
- Your goal cannot be changed and your roll cannot be affected by any means whatsoever. You can't win the game through any means other than your roll.

desc:
Post 2275
*I don't like my odds, but I'll take everything else.*
Roleblock and redirect immune
